official_title: A resolution concerning the choosing of Clerk, Sergeant at Arms, Doorkeeper, and Chaplain of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) W. Pat Jennings, of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk of the House of Representatives; (2) Kenneth R. Harding, of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Sergeant of Arms of the House of Represenatives; (3) William M. Miller, of the State Mississippi, Doorkeeper of the House of Representatives; (4) Robert V. Rota, of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Postmaster of the House of Representatives; and (5) Reverend Edward G. Latch, D.D., of the District of Columbia, Chaplain of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A resolution concerning the choosing of Clerk, Sergeant at Arms, Doorkeeper, and Chaplain of the House of Representatives.
